attributes.action: Help eradicate debt in Africa by dropping the debt and convincing other G8 leaders to do the same
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Africa is an extremely poor continent and, we as first world countries, should do our bit and show our humanity by dropping all debt to the African continent especially the poorest countries and the one’s most hit by famine drought and genocide. We as a first world country and former colonial power need to be at the forefront of this and we need to convince other countries to do the same. We can no longer stand back and watch Africa suffer. We need drastic action to help the continent out of the situation it’s in; a situation in many ways is partly our fault due to our rushed exit after colonization and many countries just haven’t been able to recover.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/worlddebt/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
